TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute Inherits AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加属性只能供从指定类型派生的元素浏览。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `browsable`此术语在说明中使用的含义 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 类似于为提供的说明 ，但附加属性的可浏览状态与的属性信息尤其相关 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，因为附加属性主要是一种 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 如果为指定了多个类型 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] ，并且任何指定的类型与 (逻辑或) 匹配，则该属性是可浏览的。If more than one type is specified for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or). 类型也可以是接口。The type can also be an interface. 这将 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 指定 `true` 。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies `true`. 这 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 只应应用于附加属性定义的 get 访问器。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 请勿将此应用于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] set 访问器。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 虽然直观地说，它是针对相关元素进行可浏览的设置操作 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，但它是 get 访问器在控制真正行为的属性定义元素上的存在和特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 有关声明附加属性的常规信息，请参阅 [附加属性概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持由此公开的一个可能的可设置值的值相等性 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现支持多个可能的哈希值，这些值基于由此公开的一个可能的可设置值 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

summary.span: 获取基类型，该类型设定此 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 应用的附加属性的使用范围。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅可通过 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 构造函数公开的声明进行设置 。This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the constructor.

summary.span: 获取此的唯一类型标识符 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 。

span.span: Gets a unique type identifier for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

value.span: 一个对象，表示 的唯一标识符。

span.span: An object that is a unique identifier for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现为每个返回一个唯一值 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] ，这是必需的，因为这 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 允许使用多个用法。This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
